attributes.action: stop the owner of Newcastle United Football Club selling the naming rights and changing the name from St James Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The historical name has existed since the inception of the football club and is synomous with Newcastle United Football Club worldwide. The actions of the owner appear to be insensitive to the feelings of the supporters of this once famous club. As part of the Town moor I also believe that under Star Chamber legislation it may even be illegal to change the name.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
